error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'num_60min_dogs' (value: 6) was used instead of 'remaining_hours' (value: 2.0).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 3300
Johnny spends 6/3=2 hours walking the 6 dogs who have 60-minute walks.
He makes $20*6=$<<20*6=120>>120 for these walks.
Thus, he has 4-2=6 hours=360 minutes left to walk the other dogs.
He can walk 3*(360/30)=<<3*(360/30)=36>>36 dogs in this time.
Thus, he will make $15*36=$<<36*15=540>>540 on these walks.
In total per day, he makes $120+$540=$<<120+540=660>>660 per day.
Thus, during the week, he makes $660*5=$<<660*5=3300>>3300.
